title: 22. What If TV Isn't Bad for Us?
description: We now have more access to TV, movies, and streaming entertainment than anytime in history. So what do we actually know about what all that screen time does to us? We look back at some compelling studies that show, actually, it may change us for the better.
author: bapu@freakonomics.com (Freakonomics Radio + Stitcher)
